Docs.summary: (Optional) This is the 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of a language. For example, use \"en\" for English; \"es\" for Spanish etc. If not set, use \"en\" for English as default. (Following only applies to 2023-04-15-preview and above) For Auto Language Detection, use \"auto\". If not set, use \"en\" for English as default.
